passages.text:
Julia::This is the front desk.  This is where you should have gone as soon as you got here.  Remember that in the future.

Julia approaches the octagonal station before you and gazes directly into the cavity behind the central pane.  Her eyes light up as she begins to converse with someone.

Julia::This young lady is in need of secondary services.

Julia::...

Julia::Just let me fill out her forms for her, we're in something of a hurry.

Julia::...

Julia::Yes, I know she'll need to provide the closing signature, but I can perform the rest.

Jasper::This hospital hasn't been operational in over a decade.  Who is she talking to?

Julia::Oh, I forgot to ask - what is your name miss?

[[p:Amelie]]
[[p:Am...ber]]

passages.text:
Julia::No, she isn't really here for any non-secondary procedures.  Jot her down for something... non-invansive.  Ingrown toe removal, go with that as the official malady.

Jasper::It seems you need an "official" reason to be here, and whatever Julia has planned for you isn't suitable.  

Jasper::So she's taken to slandering the virility of your healthy, perfectly formed toes.  Just so she can have an "official" reason to sign you in.

[[p:My toes are immaculate.]]
[[p:(Action) Remain silent and take the blow to your ego.]]

Julia::No.  I"m quite certain I saw an infected lip on the left side of your left toe.  Are we on the same page?

Jasper::She wants you to drop it.  Now.

passages.text:
As you approach, you keep your focus fixed on the document prostrated out on the counter.  

As you scan the document for suspicious clauses you start feeling something off, something amiss.

You sense something in your periphery.  You glance up.

[[Continue->Look Up]]

links.name: Continue

passages.text:
No one is behind the counter.

Nothing fills the cavity but a vacuum, along with an ether of dust and insulative particulate circulating about the air.  

Jasper::This ward has been shuttered for decades.  There was never anyone at the front desk.  Julia imagined the entire encounter.  

[[Continue->Looming]]

passages.text:
Julia throws a quick glance up to the pane towards whomever she imagines residing within the cavity.  You detect a hint of anguish in her face.  She is embarrassed by your outburst.

Julia::I'm asking you to sign this document for Valery as I explained on the way here.  I...understand that your nerves might be a little jumpy right now.  But there really isn't any circumstance for such outbursts.  

[[Who is Valery?  Why would I do anything for someone named Valery?]]
[[I don't know what you see, but there is no one on the other side of the pane.]]

She again glances nervously at the pane.

Julia::Because Valery has been kind enough to pull a few levers and get you in to see us, despite a few..."administrative roadblocks."

Jasper::Valery is the person she thinks is behind the pane.  Apparently they are doing us a favor.

Jasper::You are embarrassing her.

[[Continue->p:Alright what the hell is going on?]]

passages.text:
Julia::That's absurd, of course there is.  

She does not engage further.  Her statement is firm, but a tinge of cognitive dissonance lies just beneath the surface.  She conceals it, very well, she's had much practice - but not perfectly.

[[Continue->p:Alright what the hell is going on?]]

passages.text:
The page is visibly worn, fitting for a document likely stored within a cabinet for 20 years.  

Otherwise, it seems to be a perfectly standard medical sign in sheet, documenting your fictitious toe injury.

[[Continue->p:Alright what the hell is going on?]]

passages.text:
Julia::Then you aren't getting your operation.  Only Valery can grant access to the Maternity Ward.  

Jasper::She's serious.  If you don't officiate this occasion before the invisible clerk before you then there will be no further progression.  

Jasper::You won't find your Mom.  All the effort poured into organizing and funding this infiltration will have been in vain.

[[p:I'm not signing it, even if it means I don't get to go forward.]]

passages.text:

Julia::You won't find any alternative routes, I might add.

[[Continue->p:Alright what the hell is going on?]]

links.link: p:Alright what the hell is going on?

passages.text:
Jasper::You really don't have any choice in the matter.

Jasper::You *are* going to sign the document.  We are moving forward.  We don't have any other choice.

You can feel your hand rising towards the pen.

[[p:This isn't fair.  I shouldn't have to do this!]]

passages.text:
Julia pushes the signed document forward, towards "Valery."

Julia::Thank you for cooperating.  I know this procedure probably seems excessively elaborate, but we've got to take the proper precautions and document your visit.  

Julia::We're subject to very intense scrutiny by a number of HART accountants, as I'm sure you are aware.

Julia makes a quick gesture to the vacuous entity behind the glass and pivots to the right.  She expects you to follow her lead and start heading down the hall.
